lines.text: [seeing Lewis get chummy with Stan Gable]
You've become the worst kind of nerd. A self-hating one. I remember when you were the George Washington of nerds. Now, you're more like the Benedict Arnold!
[after Lewis refuses to help the Tri-Lambs]
I used to have an uncle. His name wasn't Lew, it was *Lewis*! And I was proud to have his Scolnick blood coursing through my veins!
Oh, I've seen you in the newspaper. You're the dean with the low I.Q.!
The nerds gave me pimples!
You don't eat meat! You don't do drugs! What's wrong with kids today?
We've had the benefit of learning from your generation's mistakes. We believe in "Just Say No." So, with all due respect, we won't turn out like you.

[brief pause]
Oh, well that makes sense.
Are you Japanese?

[Using "Elvis Presley" style of speach throughout movie]
Heck, naw, boy. I'm Korean.
Why do you talk like that?
South Korean.
There's no greater friend to the nerd than the American DJ. If we weren't all nerds ourselves, we'd all be on television.
Do you have the proper windshield wipers?
Certainly. What would you like to see them do?
I'm your attorney.
Oh, Mr. Dawson!
No, no, no, call me Booger.
Certainly, Mr. Booger.
No, no, not Mr. Boo... Well, no, wait a minute... I kind of like that. Mr. Booger. It's kind of distinguished.
What are you guys eating? Cows eat that crap.
I like this guy already.
